## Notes for Contributors

- **Typo fixes / minor documentation changes**: Please open an Issue instead of a PR. These small changes will be batched together in future releases.
- **New features**: Please open an Issue first to discuss the feature before submitting a PR.
- **Bug fixes**: Include steps to reproduce the bug and how your fix addresses it.
